rules_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep you may pay {B}, if you do turn Kawakami Gensai, Manslayer face down, it becomes a 2/2 Creature that you may turn it face up at any time by paying its mana cost.
[i]Sword-Unsheathing - Might of Heaven – [/i]When Kawakami Gensai, Manslayer becomes turned face up, destroy target creature.
